titles.title: A resolution electing David J. Schiappa of Maryland as Secretary for the Minority of the Senate.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 1/4/2007--Passed Senate without amendment. (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.) Elects David J. Schiappa as Secretary for the Minority of the Senate.
